00001 /* Transaction.cpp --
00002                         Transaction class.  base class for working with account
00003                         data.  Works with TinyXML to create an XML element that
00004                         can be passed around to more broad classes.

00037 //create a transaction when the date is given as a single string
00038 Transaction::Transaction(string _amount, string _date, string _memo, string _tofrom, bool _credit){
00039         amount  = _amount;
00040         date    = _date;
00041         memo    = _memo;
00042         tofrom  = _tofrom;
00043         credit  = _credit;
00044         
00045         year  = atoi( (date.substr(0,3)).c_str() );
00046         month = atoi( (date.substr(4,2)).c_str() );
00047         day   = atoi( (date.substr(6,2)).c_str() );
00048         
00049         //Initialize the XML Element TransactionXML
00050         TransactionXML  = new TiXmlElement( "transaction" );
00051         
00052         //set the xml portion.
00053         setXML();
00054 }
00055 
00056 //create a transaction when the date is given as a single string and cat code
00057 Transaction::Transaction(string _amount, string _date, string _memo, string _tofrom, bool _credit, int _cat_code){
00058         amount  = _amount;
00059         date    = _date;
00060         memo    = _memo;
00061         tofrom  = _tofrom;
00062         credit  = _credit;
00063         cat_code = _cat_code;
00064         
00065         year  = atoi( (date.substr(0,3)).c_str() );
00066         month = atoi( (date.substr(4,2)).c_str() );
00067         day   = atoi( (date.substr(6,2)).c_str() );
00068         
00069         //Initialize the XML Element TransactionXML
00070         TransactionXML  = new TiXmlElement( "transaction" );
00071         
00072         //set the xml portion.
00073         setXML();
00074 }

00076 /* A way to manually set all parts of the Transactoin Object */
00077 Transaction::Transaction(string a, int m, int d, int y, int i, string mem, string tofm, bool is) 
00078 {
00079     amount = a; month = m; day = d; year = y;
00080     
00081     //set date string
00082     if (month < 10){
00083                 date = to_string(year).append("0");
00084                 date.append(to_string(month));
00085                 date.append(to_string(day));
00086         }
00087         else{
00088                 date = to_string(year).append(to_string(month));
00089                 date.append(to_string(day));
00090         }  
00091     
00092         //ID unique to transaction... possibility to implement a counter, for automatic uniques...
00093         idnum = i;
00094 
00095         //strings
00096     memo = mem; tofrom = tofm;
00097         
00098         //bool
00099     credit = is;
00100         
00101         //Initialize the XML Element TransactionXML
00102         TransactionXML  = new TiXmlElement( "transaction" );
00103         
00104         //set the xml portion.
00105         setXML();       
00106 }
00107 
00108 Transaction::Transaction (TiXmlElement * root)
00109 {       
00110         TransactionXML = root;
00111         
00112         TiXmlNode* pElem = (*root).FirstChild( "memo" );
00113         
00114     for( pElem; pElem; pElem=pElem->NextSiblingElement())
00115     {
00116     
00117                 //string pKey = to_string( pElem->Value() );
00118                 const char *pKey=pElem->Value();
00119         
00120                 if ( pKey )
00121                 {
00122                         
00123                 //show elements in userdata
00124                 if ( to_string(pKey) == "memo" ) {
00125                         memo = to_string( ((TiXmlElement*)pElem)->GetText() ) ;
00126                         }
00127                         
00128                 if ( to_string(pKey) == "tofrom" ) {
00129                         tofrom = to_string( ((TiXmlElement*)pElem)->GetText() ) ;
00130                         }
00131                 
00132                 if ( to_string(pKey) == "amount" ) {
00133                         amount = to_string( ((TiXmlElement*)pElem)->GetText() ) ;
00134                         }
00135                 
00136                 if ( to_string(pKey) == "date" ){
00137                         date = to_string( ((TiXmlElement*)pElem)->GetText() ) ;
00138                         year  = atoi( (date.substr(0,3)).c_str() );
00139                         month = atoi( (date.substr(4,2)).c_str() );
00140                         day   = atoi( (date.substr(6,2)).c_str() );
00141                 }
00142                 
00143                 if ( to_string(pKey) == "credit" ) {
00144                         credit = (bool) atoi( ((TiXmlElement*)pElem)->GetText() ) ;
00145                         }
00146                 
00147                 if ( to_string(pKey) == "category" ) {
00148                         TiXmlNode* pElem_cat = pElem->FirstChildElement( "category" );
00149                         cat_code = atoi( ((TiXmlElement*)pElem)->GetText() ) ;
00150                         }
00151             
00152                 }       
00153         }
00154 
00155 }

00158 /* Prints the transaction out to the terminal in a logical way */
00159 void Transaction::show() {
00160     //cout << "## Transaction: tofrom: " << tofrom << " dated: " << date << endl;
00161     
00162         if(credit)
00163         {
00164                 cout << "\tfrom: \"" << tofrom << "\"\tdate: \"" << date << "\"\tamount: $" << amount << "memo: \"" << memo << "\"" << endl;
00165                 //cout << "\t" << "CREDIT:\t$" << amount << endl;
00166         }
00167         else
00168         {
00169                 cout << "\t  to: \"" << tofrom << "\"\tdate: \"" << date << "\"\tamount: $" << amount << "memo: \"" << memo << "\"" << endl;
00170                 //cout << "\t" << "DEBIT: \t$" << amount << endl;
00171         }
00172         
00173         //cout << "\t" << "MEMO: " << "\t" << memo << endl;                                             
00174 }

00177 /* Sets the XML for a Transaction object. */
00178 void Transaction::setXML() {
00179         /*  //Example Transaction XML //
00180          *      <transaction>
00181                  *      <memo>Weekly Fuel Purchase</memo>
00182                  *      <tofrom>B&V Gas Station</tofrom>
00183                  *      <amount>540.43</amount> 
00184                  *      <date>20080401</date>
00185                  *      <credit>1</credit>              <-- if the charge is a credit (not a debit), this field contains a "1" 
00186                  *      <categories>
00187                  *              <Category>4</Category>
00188                  *      </categories>
00189          *      </transaction>
00190          */
00191  
00192         // <memo>Weekly Fuel Purchase</memo>
00193         TiXmlElement * tMemo = new TiXmlElement( "memo" );
00194         TransactionXML->LinkEndChild( tMemo);
00195         TiXmlText * txMemo = new TiXmlText( memo );
00196         tMemo->LinkEndChild( txMemo );
00197         
00198         // <tofrom>B&V Gas Station</tofrom>
00199         TiXmlElement * tTofrom = new TiXmlElement( "tofrom" );
00200         TransactionXML->LinkEndChild( tTofrom);
00201         TiXmlText * txTofrom = new TiXmlText( tofrom );
00202         tTofrom->LinkEndChild( txTofrom );
00203         
00204         // <amount>540.43</amount>
00205         TiXmlElement * tAmount = new TiXmlElement( "amount" );
00206         TransactionXML->LinkEndChild( tAmount );
00207         TiXmlText * txAmount = new TiXmlText( amount );
00208         tAmount->LinkEndChild( txAmount );
00209         
00210         // <date>20080401</date>
00211         if (month < 10){
00212                 date = to_string(year).append("0");
00213                 date.append(to_string(month));
00214                 date.append(to_string(day));
00215         }
00216         else{
00217                 date = to_string(year).append(to_string(month));
00218                 date.append(to_string(day));
00219         }
00220         TiXmlElement * tDate = new TiXmlElement( "date" );
00221         TransactionXML->LinkEndChild( tDate );
00222         TiXmlText * txDate = new TiXmlText( date );
00223         tDate->LinkEndChild( txDate );
00224         
00225         // <credit>1</credit>
00226         TiXmlElement * tCredit = new TiXmlElement( "credit" );
00227         TransactionXML->LinkEndChild( tCredit );
00228         TiXmlText * txCredit = new TiXmlText( to_string( credit ) );
00229         tCredit->LinkEndChild( txCredit );
00230         
00231         // create the category in XML
00232         TiXmlElement * tCatP = new TiXmlElement( "categories" );
00233         TransactionXML->LinkEndChild( tCatP );
00234         TiXmlElement * tCatC = new TiXmlElement( "category" );
00235         tCatP->LinkEndChild( tCatC );
00236         TiXmlText * txCat = new TiXmlText( to_string( cat_code ) );
00237         tCatC->LinkEndChild( txCat );
00238 
00239 }
00240 
00241 TiXmlElement * Transaction::getXML() 
00242 {
00243         return TransactionXML;
00244 }
00245 
00246 //returns the amount in a transaction
00247 string Transaction::getAmount()
00248 {       
00249         return amount;
00250 }
